Tasks.Task Description: Use Azure Monitor and Synapse Analytics built-in tools to continuously monitor database performance metrics such as query execution times, resource utilization, and data throughput.
Regularly review and optimize database indexes to ensure efficient query performance and reduce resource consumption.
Schedule regular backups of Synapse Analytics databases and test restore procedures to ensure data recovery in case of failure.
Review and update database security policies, including access controls, firewall rules, and encryption settings, to align with organizational security standards.
Conduct regular audits of database configurations to ensure compliance with best practices and organizational policies.
Analyze and optimize slow-running queries using query performance insights and tuning recommendations provided by Synapse Analytics.
Perform failover tests to validate the resiliency of Synapse Analytics databases and ensure high availability during outages.
Analyze database usage patterns to identify opportunities for cost optimization and resource scaling.
Ensure all database configurations, maintenance procedures, and troubleshooting guides are documented and kept up-to-date.
Conduct incident response drills to prepare the team for potential database outages or security incidents. Ensure familiarity with recovery procedures.
Evaluate the SLA performance of Synapse Analytics databases and address any deviations from agreed metrics.
Develop and execute plans for database upgrades or expansions to accommodate growing data and performance needs.
Ensure the operations team participates in regular training to stay updated with new Synapse Analytics features, best practices, and security measures.
Collect and analyze user feedback regarding database performance and reliability. Implement continuous improvements based on this feedback.
